title: Woman shot in what is being called accidental
content:
A Troy woman was shot Friday evening in what police say is an accidental shooting. according to the Troy Police Department.
At approximately 5:45 p.m., Lincoln County Central Communications received a 911 call from the 600 block of Wilhoit Court from a female stating she had been shot. Police and paramedics were dispatched to the area.
A female was located who had sustained a single gunshot wound to the upper back. She was transported by the Lincoln County Ambulance District to a hospital in St. Charles County for treatment.
During the investigation it was determined she had been accidentally shot by a male resident while he was attempting to unload the firearm.
The female sustained non-life threatening injuries.
